main event: On May 10, 1966, four witnesses in Camden, Ohio, observed a bright object resembling a high powered searchlight, reddish to pale yellow in color, for a duration of approximately 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object hovered at an elevation of around 1500-2000 feet and moved back and forth before fading from view., Witnesses reported that the object made no sound during the observation., The object was observed at an azimuth of 110 degrees., One witness prior to this sighting had seen a similar object on May 10, 1966., The sighting was reported to be in clear sky conditions and lasted for 20 minutes.
sighted object: One bright object resembling a high powered searchlight
witness description: Multiple civilians, including individuals stationed in the U.S. Armed Forces.
